segments.text: I have a little problem with room 507 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What exactly seems to be the problem , Mr . Sandals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I found cockroaches in my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've seen at least nine different cockroaches in my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , are you sure you haven't seen the same silverfish nine times ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are nine cockroaches in my room . I don't have time for your disbelief !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I apologize . One moment , please , while I transfer you to my supervisor .
segments.speaker: S2
